overview: Raquel Darrian does a striptease for Derrick Lane. Alex Jordan and Steve Drake make passionate love while Rasha watches. Silently. Racquel appears again and plays with herself, while Derrick ravishes Alex Jordan. Then, without saying a word, Alex alone takes Racquel to a shuddering climax. No words are spoken. Barely a sound is made. But passion is a language we all understand. And in the mind bending Judy Blue fashion, silence has never been more provocative.
tagline: Love means never having to say anything.
title: Silent Strangers
